EmailTemplate.name: Event - Update Special Invite - Netherlands - 25/06/2015.Email - Follow Up - Att
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your participation - Tosca Update Special 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Utrecht – June 25th, 2015
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We would like to thank you for your participation in the Tosca Update Special in Utrecht and hope you enjoyed the presentations on the new Tosca Testsuite 8.4.
- Tricentis Update Special Presentation <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/Tricentis-Update-Special_NL.PDF> - Dutch TOSCA User Group Presentation <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/Tosca-aankondiging-gebruikersgroep.pdf> - Fact Sheet: Tosca Integrations <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/20150513-Tosca-Integrations-Factsheet-A4_PRINT.pdf> - Fact Sheet: Mobile + <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/20150427-Mobile-Plus Fact-Sheet_ A4-PRINT.pdf> - Fact Sheet: Orchestrated Service Virtualization <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/20150427-Orchestrated-Service-Virtualization-A4_PRINT.pdf> - Fact Sheet: Tosca Impact Analysis for SAP <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/20150304-Tosca-Impact-Analysis-for-SAP-Fact-Sheet-A4.pdf> - Fact Sheet: Tosca ECC Accelerator <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/20150421-Tosca-ECC-Accelerator-Factsheet-A4_PRINT.pdf> - Fact Sheet: Risk Coverage Optimization/Test Case Design <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/491-XCL-893/images/20150421-Risk-Coverage-Optimization-Factsheet-A4_PRINT.pdf>
Please feel free to share the contents of the Update Special 2015 event with colleagues using the What´s New Videos <http://www.tricentis.com/tricentis-tosca-testsuite/what-is-new/8-4-0> on our website.
Thank you again for your positive feedback and lively participation. We look forward to seeing you again at future events!
Best Regards, Ernst Jan Smit & The Tricentis Team
Ernst Jan Smit Sales Manager Benelux
m - +31 611 533 103 e – e.smit@tricentis.com
